subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Ken Anderson and Peter Windsor, the principals behind a new United States-based Formula One team called USF1, announced their intent Tuesday to run the 2010 schedule. They said they would base the team in Charlotte, N.C., the home for most Nascar teams, and scour the market for young American drivers.
